location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map of the Frontier between Shemiran and Mandali'

mods.abstract: Map showing the possible alternatives for the Turco-Persian Frontier between Shemiran and Mandali drawn up by Ely Banister Soane 13 January 1913.The red line shows Mr Soane's preferred boundary; the blue line shows the frontier should Chia Shurkh [ChiyƒÅ Sarkh] remain in Persian territory; and the alternating red and blue line provides for the contingency of the winter lands of the Senjabi tribe remaining within Turkish territory.A note to accompany the map can be found on folio 232 of the volume.Lithographed by Harrison and Sons, London.
